Exceptions¶

pyholster defines it’s own exceptions, generally based on HTTP response codes. All exceptions defined by pyholster start with PH and are descendants of PHException.

exception pyholster.errors.PHBadRequest[source]¶

Server returned a 400 Bad Request code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHException[source]¶

General exception, parent to all other exceptions.

exception pyholster.errors.PHFailed[source]¶

Server returned a 402 Failed code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHNotAcceptable[source]¶

Server returned a 406 Not Acceptable code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHNotFound[source]¶

Server returned a 404 Not Found code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHRequestException[source]¶

Request exceptions are thrown due to HTTP response codes and descendants of PHRequestException.

exception pyholster.errors.PHServerError[source]¶

Server returned a 500, 502, 503, or 504 Server Error code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHUnauthorized[source]¶

Server returned a 401 Unauthorized code.

exception pyholster.errors.PHUnknown[source]¶

Server returned a unknown HTTP status code.
